29.ara-name: كتاب الفرائض عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abudullah bin Mawhab - and some of them said- 'Abdullah bin Wahb, narrated from Tamim Ad-Dari who said:'I asked the Messenger of Allah(S.A.W): What is the Sunnah regarding a man among the people of the Shirk who accepts Islam at the hand of a man among the Muslims?' So the Messenger of Allah(S.A.W) said: "He is the closet of the people to him in his life and in his death

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مِيرَاثِ الَّذِي يُسْلِمُ عَلَى يَدَىِ الرَّجُلِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About(The Inheritance of) The Man Who Accepted Islam At The Hand Of Another Man
